thread.title: Ratings Watch - S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA)

title: Ratings Watch - S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA)
text:
Home » Analyst Views » Ratings Watch – S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Ratings Watch – S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) on July 14, 2015 
Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) have been given a consensus rating of 2.4 by brokerage analysts covering the stock. This number is based on a simplified ratings scale of 1-5 where 1 represents a Strong Buy and 5 a Strong Sell. This number, which is calculated by Zacks Research, is based on the 2 sell-side research firms offering short-term price targets on the equity. Three months ago analysts had a rating of 2.4 on the stock. 
The covering brokerage firms also offer predicted future one year price targets on the shares. Currently the projections range from $30 to $31 with the average sitting at $30.5. 
Earnings Focus 
Looking ahead to future earnings growth, analysts are expecting S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) to report earnings per share of $0.49 for the quarter ending on 2015-06-30. This is the consensus EPS estimates based on the 2 brokers taken into consideration. Looking further ahead, analysts have a long-term growth earnings per share estimate of $N/A on the stock. This is the best estimate for both earnings and revenue over the next three to five years. 
All eyes will be on S&T Bancorp, Inc. on 2015-07-21 when the Street is expecting the company to report their quarterly numbers. Analysts will be looking for an improvement on last quarter’s numbers where the firm reported earnings of $0.46 per share for the period ending on 2015-03-31. This was $-0.02 away from what the analysts had expected, or a -4.17% surprise factor.
